name: Guitar
description: A 1980 Les Paul guitar. Minimal wear. Used by famous musician in concert tour. Signed on lower right side.

name: Toyota 4Runner
description: 2012 Toyota 4Runner. 140k miles. New tires, headlights, and reverse sensor. Has been in one accident but only recieved cosmetic damage.

name: MSI Laptop
description: Lenovo gaming laptop. Has an intel i7 cpu and an NVIDIA 2070 super m gpu. Runs great. Recently disassembled back plate and cleaned dust out of the air ducts.

name: Astros A50 Headphones
description: Astro branded headphones. Lightly used. Compatible with PC/MAC, XBOX Series X|S, but not with PS5. Wireless headset with Flip-to-Mute mic, 3D audio ready, Dolby Audio and more.

name: Saxophone
description: Saxophone that has been used by my son while in school. Purchased in 2007 and used until 2011. Properly maintained and keypads have been replaced recently. Does not come with mouthpiece.

name: Nokia Cell Phone
description: Old phone that still works perfectly fine. Been through the trials and tribulations that no other phone would survive. Finally upgrading my phone to a Razr, heard they are good.

name: Hammer
description: Old massive hammer. Not your typical household hammer, the head is just a big square metal thing. I can't pick it up and it's just in the way of everything. It landed in my backyard and I just want it out. Looks old, maybe 1800's?

name: Baseball Glove
description: Worn by the great Don Kelly. Long time Tigers player who could play literally any position! It's worn down and the signature has faded as well

name: Blue's Clue's Chair
description: Chair that came directly from the set! Please don't ask how I got it, but I was lucky enough to be at the right time and right place! It's great for comfortable sitting and reading but it's taking a lot of space and I need to get it out of my house.

name: Pontiac Sunfire
description: Great first time car. Has about 175k miles and runs well. Tires recently changed and oil has been changed as well. No major accidents just minor bumps and bruises.

name: Phone booth
description: Such a cool artifact. Came with the house we bought and I have no use for it. Kids use it and will be in there for hours. Looking to rehome this!

name: Signed Michael Jordan Baseball Card
description: I was able to meeting Jordan in Chicago one time and I brought a baseball card in hopes to catch up with him. To my delight I was able to get this card signed and it's been framed ever since. I am looking to sell this to purchase some new memorbilia.
